tool_description: Identifies potential duplicate volunteer opportunity listings across platforms to prevent redundant postings.

listing_content.description: JSON string containing the volunteer listing content to check for duplicates

search_platforms.description: Platforms to search for potential duplicates

check_organization_only.description: Whether to only check for duplicates from the same organization

error_messages: Invalid listing content: The listing_content is not valid JSON or is missing required fields.
Invalid similarity threshold: similarity_threshold must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Platform search failed: Unable to search one or more platforms for duplicate listings.
Unsupported platform: One or more search_platforms are not supported for duplicate detection.
Search quota exceeded: Platform API limits have been reached for duplicate detection.
usage: Provide listing_content and specify search_platforms to check for duplicates. Adjust similarity_threshold to control detection sensitivity.

duplicate_listings.description: Details of potential duplicate listings found

similarity_scores.description: Similarity scores for each potential duplicate

recommended_action.description: Recommended action based on duplicate detection results
